message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fair starting point, and we can adjust it later if needed.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair, considering the inflation rate. This way, we can both get a decent amount.
Let's compromise. I'll take 5500, and you get 4500. We can't keep going back and forth, inflation will eat away at our gains.
